headline: Musk's Texas-sized $1 trillion payday enabled by state's new law
summary: WILMINGTON, Delaware (Reuters) -Elon Musk's blow-out $1 trillionÂ pay package from Tesla proves everything is bigger in Texas, especially under its new management-friendly law.  Last year, Tesla reincorporated in the Lone Star State after a judge in its former corporate home, Delaware, ruled a $56 billion compensation for the CEO was "unfathomable" and unfair to shareholders.  Musk urged companies to ditch Delaware and his board worked on a new pay package.
